item.title: How Do I Segment My Network?
item.description: A lot of people ask me why I have so many VLANs, and how I split everything up on my home network, so let’s walk through it!

item.title: What Am I Running?
item.description: Between the two servers I have on my network, I run a lot of stuff. Here’s the gist of what it all does.
